reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Prioritized HIV Prevention and Treatment Services for Key Populations in Bangladesh

description.narrative: Bangladesh - HIV - International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh - icddr,b. This program has the following goals: To minimize the spread of HIV and the impact of AIDS on the individual, family, community, and society, working towards Ending AIDS in Bangladesh by 2030. The objectives of this program are: To increase coverage of services, to increase the identification of PLHIV and to prevent new HIV infections for 24.72% of MSM/MSW (from 21.30%), 49.02% of TG (from 39.83%), 81.76% of PWID (from 28.73%) and 30.6% of FSW (from 18.09%), considering the targets of the national size estimation 2015-16. To provide universal access to treatment, care and support services for the people living with HIV. To strengthen the coordination mechanisms and management capacity at different levels to ensure an effective national multi-sectoral HIV&AIDS response. To strengthen strategic information systems and research for an evidence-based response

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for BGD-H-ICDDRB
Percentage of facilities which record and submit data using the electronic information system
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Percentage of TG that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP-Other 1: Number of PWID received OST at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of TG reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
Impact indicator for BGD-H-ICDDRB
Percentage of people living with HIV
Percentage of transgender people who are living with HIV
HIV I-Other 1: Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV in Dhaka
HIV I-Other 2: Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV outside Dhaka
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
HIV I-Other 2: Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV outside Dhaka
HIV I-Other 1: Percentage of people who inject drugs who are HIV infected in Dhaka
HIV I-11-other: Percentage of people who inject drugs who are HIV infected in Central Bangladesh (Dhaka)
Outcome indicator for BGD-H-ICDDRB
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting condom use at last sex
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their last anal sex with a non-regular male partner
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
HIV O-other 3: Percentage of injecting drug users reporting the use of a condom the last time they had sexual intercourse
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their most recent sexual intercourse or anal sex
Percentage of transgender people who sell sex reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
HIV O-other 2: Percentage of MSM used condom in last sex with commercial male partners in the last six months
HIV O-5: Percentage of transgender reporting the use of a condom last time they had anal sex with male partners
HIV O-other 1: Percentage of MSM used condom in last sex with non-commercial male partners in the last six months
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner

Percentage of people living with HIV not on ART at the end of the reporting period among people living with HIV who were either on ART at the end of the last reporting period or newly initiated on ART during the reporting period
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
